item.description: The New Hampshire Advantage Coalition is definitely going forward with a spending cap for the November 2009 ballot. The Association of Portsmouth Taxpayers is having a final meeting to ratify their participation and to get the necessary twenty-five registered Portsmouth voters’ signatures on the affidavit to get things moving. If you are interested and can’t make it, ask me (Chris) for Bill St. Laurent’s contact info so he can keep track.
item.how_to_find_us: APT is meeting in the Hilton Garden Inn room on the second floor.
item.name: Portsmouth spending cap final planning
